From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine started toward the cave, evading the mines, he heard the cry for
help from inside the cave , Great, now we have to play med bot." he said
hateing the position they were in. It was Icebirds turn to be more cautious.

"Somethings not right, If he were hurt it seems like his mind would be more
eratic." She thought for a moment about the whole situation and decided they
couldn't take that chance.

She opened her mind again communicating telepathically with Lunarpine. "How
fast can you get around the mountain?" she was hoping to find another way in
and surprise the bot if it was a trap.

Lunarpine sensed her plan, transformed to full wolf mode and sprinted up the
mountain and down the other side. She was right to be overcautious, an
injured bot wouldn't have had the time to lay a minefield, either there was
more than one or the bot had lied to them. Either way didn't seem safe.

Ice transformed to polar bear and started into the cave. She kept a mental
eye on the cave hopeing that the bot was hurt and not an enemy. She wasn't
the fighter that she wished to be, that fact kept her further apart from the
wolf she loved. She tried to communicate again with the other bot, "Where
are you? it's dark, give me some sort of sign." She knew that her owl mode
would've been a better choice but her bear form was the more dureable of her
three forms so it seemed the smarter choice.
----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 1:33 PM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron


�Grizzltron�


   The explosion rocks the cave, but it doesn't cave in.  Grizzltron gets
down lower and waits with his grenade launcher for the new guest.
Grizzltron barely hears something about friends, but he thinks it just the
two bots talking outside.  Grizzltron then yells out in a Low and Harse
voice, "Ahhh, I can't come out, I broke my leg, you have to come in here."
Grizzltron just waited with his Grenade Launcher waiting too.
